title.narrative: Strengthening the Institutions for Trans-boundary Water Management in Africa

description.narrative: 2010 AAP ENRTPStrengthening the Institutions for Trans-boundary Water Management in AfricaThe international organisation will be INBO or GWPO.1.Technical Assistance to ANBO to become a pillar under the AU and AMC2. BOs will develop IWRM Plans

title.narrative: Establishment of legal/institutional support roadmap for African Lake and River Basin Organisations (L/RBOs) with EU support

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Low level of influence and sustainability for ANBO

comment.narrative: Low level of influence and sustainability for ANBO

actual.value: Medium level of influence and sustainability: ANBO has established itself as a mandated and operational African organisation equipped with a long term strategy and an action plan but failed to establish an independent Secretariat
